caption.p: Proportions of trees belonging to different ecological groups in unlogged (a), early logged (b), and recently logged (c) forest stands in 2000 (dark bars) and 2009 (light bars). ARAUC, Araucaria; LSP, Large‐Seeded Pioneer; LST, Large Shade Tolerant; P, Pioneer; SST, Small Shade Tolerant; WLT, Wind‐Dispersed Large Tree
